title: honor level 3, down from 5
body:
i saw i am honor level 3 today

i didn't see any notice of being chat restricted, and if i was wouldn't it have made me honor level 1?

my friends say they are still honor level 5

i don't understand what it going on

replies.body:
It doesn't look like this account was ever at Honor rank 5. Could you have been thinking of a smurf account possibly?

EDIT: Just noticed your account has the Honor 5 Ward....the heck? Looking into this in much greater detail as I type this, should have some kind of update shortly
i have the honor 5 ward skin

Just noticed that after looking into this deeper for you. You're right! 

I can, in fact, see that you've got the Honor 5 ward, which should mean you ended the season at Honor 5, but for some reason, the honor tab isn't showing any history of you being rank 5, and currently showing rank 3. 

Sorry for that mixup. I'm still talking this over with some people trying to figure out exactly what happened here. I'm going to get you a ticket created with our game people so that we can track this issue and make sure it's fixed properly.
You are not the only one. Mine is changed to level 4 from 5.
